amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the amount for deposit into the Federal Building Fund by $152,979,000, and, notwithstanding any other provision of the Act, to provide that the amount available from revenues and collections deposited into the Fund shall be available for necessary expenses of real property management and related activities not otherwise provided for in the aggregate amount of $8,619,023,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
